About Text: Hello. I am a Chartered Accountant by profession. I have 6+ years of experience including my articleship. During my Chartered Accountancy course, I have developed interest in Indian as well as in International Taxation. To enhance my knowledge, I have currently enrolled in the courses focusing on Transfer Pricing and Advanced Corporate Taxation. Apart from my profession, I am a trained Voice Over and Dubbing Artist. I have also trained in Bharatanatyam dance form and Classical music. My other interests are reading and travelling, listening to music. Thank you for visiting my Profile. If you would like to reach out to me, feel free to email me at - isha.spadhye@gmail.com.

* Provided customer service for smooth loan process.
